title: Offseason clichés & ATN mailbag
itunes:title: Offseason clichés & ATN mailbag
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- list some offseason tropes used by players and coaches from around the league (26:52). Then the guys answer your ATN mailbag questions including who is the most valuable player that isn’t a QB, what counts as a successful rookie season for Marcus Mariota and which Eagles receiver will have the most yards? (43:25)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
